Body:
"""
        Test of :meth:`PyTravisCI.communication.Communication.is_digit`.
        """
comm = Communication(self.root)
expected = False
actual = comm.is_digit('hello')
self.assertEqual(expected, actual)
expected = True
actual = comm.is_digit('1')
self.assertEqual(expected, actual)
actual = comm.is_digit(1)
self.assertEqual(expected, actual)
